info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 6:07PM MDT until July 09 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TETON...SOUTHWESTERN CHOUTEAU AND CASCADE COUNTIES... At 606 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Black Eagle, or near Great Falls, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Great Falls, Cascade, Belt, Black Eagle, Highwood, Floweree, Portage, Eden, Sluice Boxes State Park, Malmstrom Afb, Stockett, Tracy, Vaughn, First Peoples Buffalo Jump State Park, Centerville, Sun River, Armington, Ulm and Sand Coulee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
